import axios from'axios';import{useAuthStore}from'../stores/authStore';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:8000';class ApiService{constructor(){this.api=void 0;this.api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,timeout:10000,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Request interceptor to add auth token
this.api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=useAuthStore.getState().token;if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});// Response interceptor to handle errors

const message=((_error$response2=error.response)===null||_error$response2===void 0?void 0:(_error$response2$data=_error$response2.data)===null||_error$response2$data===void 0?void 0:_error$response2$data.detail)||((_error$response3=error.response)===null||_error$response3===void 0?void 0:(_error$response3$data=_error$response3.data)===null||_error$response3$data===void 0?void 0:_error$response3$data.message)||error.message||'An error occurred';return Promise.reject(new Error(message));});}// Generic methods
async get(url,config){const response=await this.api.get(url,config);return response.data;}async post(url,data,config){const response=await this.api.post(url,data,config);return response.data;}async put(url,data,config){const response=await this.api.put(url,data,config);return response.data;}async delete(url,config){const response=await this.api.delete(url,config);return response.data;}// Auth endpoints
async login(email,password){return this.post('/api/auth/login',{email,password});}async register(userData){return this.post('/api/auth/register',userData);}async getCurrentUser(){return this.get('/api/auth/me');}// Product endpoints
async getProducts(params){return this.get('/api/products',{params});}async getProduct(id){return this.get("/api/products/".concat(id));}async getFeaturedProducts(){return this.get('/api/products/featured');}async getProductRecommendations(productId,limit){return this.get("/api/products/".concat(productId,"/recommendations"),{params:{limit}});}// Cart endpoints
async getCart(){return this.get('/api/users/cart');}async addToCart(productId,quantity){return this.post('/api/users/cart',{product_id:productId,quantity});}async updateCartItem(itemId,quantity){return this.put("/api/users/cart/".concat(itemId),{quantity});}async removeFromCart(itemId){return this.delete("/api/users/cart/".concat(itemId));}async clearCart(){return this.delete('/api/users/cart');}async getCartSummary(){return this.get('/api/users/cart/summary');}// Order endpoints
async createOrder(orderData){return this.post('/api/orders',orderData);}async getUserOrders(params){return this.get('/api/orders',{params});}async getOrder(id){return this.get("/api/orders/".concat(id));}async updateOrder(id,data){return this.put("/api/orders/".concat(id),data);}// User endpoints
async getUserRecommendations(limit){return this.get('/api/users/recommendations',{params:{limit}});}async createReview(reviewData){return this.post('/api/users/reviews',reviewData);}async getUserReviews(params){return this.get('/api/users/reviews',{params});}// Admin endpoints
async getAllOrders(params){return this.get('/api/orders/admin/all',{params});}async createProduct(productData){return this.post('/api/products',productData);}async updateProduct(id,productData){return this.put("/api/products/".concat(id),productData);}// Analytics endpoints
async getDashboardAnalytics(days){return this.get('/api/analytics/dashboard',{params:{days}});}async getSalesAnalytics(days,groupBy){return this.get('/api/analytics/sales',{params:{days,group_by:groupBy}});}async getInventoryAnalytics(){return this.get('/api/analytics/inventory');}async getPricingAnalytics(days){return this.get('/api/analytics/pricing',{params:{days}});}async getCustomerServiceAnalytics(days){return this.get('/api/analytics/customer-service',{params:{days}});}async getAiAgentAnalytics(days){return this.get('/api/analytics/ai-agents',{params:{days}});}// AI Agent endpoints
async getAgentStatus(){return this.get('/api/agents/status');}async executeAgent(agentName,context){return this.post("/api/agents/execute/".concat(agentName),{agent_name:agentName,context:context||{}});}async executeAllAgents(context){return this.post('/api/agents/execute-all',context||{});}async activateAgent(agentName){return this.post("/api/agents/activate/".concat(agentName));}async deactivateAgent(agentName){return this.post("/api/agents/deactivate/".concat(agentName));}async generateRecommendations(userId,limit){return this.post('/api/agents/recommendations/generate',{user_id:userId,limit:limit||10});}async handleCustomerInquiry(userId,message,type){return this.post('/api/agents/customer-service/handle-inquiry',{user_id:userId,message,interaction_type:type||'chat'});}async checkInventoryStatus(){return this.post('/api/agents/inventory/check-stock');}async optimizePricing(){return this.post('/api/agents/pricing/optimize');}async getAgentPerformance(){return this.get('/api/agents/analytics/agent-performance');}async getAgentLogs(agentName,limit){return this.get("/api/agents/logs/".concat(agentName),{params:{limit}});}}export const apiService=new ApiService();export default apiService;
